summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing financial matters and advice. Epstein expresses regret for not following advice regarding financial positions, indicating a significant loss. The email highlights the confidential nature of the communication and includes disclaimers about legal privilege.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing financial losses and expressing regret over not following advice.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, engaged in discussions with Epstein regarding financial matters.
